pull.title: qa: Remove need to handle the network thread in tests
pull.body: This simplifies test writing by removing the need to handle the network thread in tests. E.g. start thread, join thread, restart thread mid-test, adding p2p connections at the "right" time, ...

events.body: Please review the refactoring in #13512 first.

Big concept ACK!

`feature_block.py` currently failing on Travis.

Cursory review. A few nits inline.

Will do full review once #13512 is merged.

Tested ACK aaaa4a4b17506f526bebee65b0ea930289f79016. 

Looks great Marco. Thanks for doing this. A few nits inline - feel free to ignore.
